MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL48 postcode area of Minffordd affecting properties in Cae Eithin Estate and the surrounding area. Our engineers are on site and in order to complete the repairs need to isolate the power to further properties at 4:15PM, for these customers we are aiming to restore power by 4:45PM. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power for remaining properties to be restored by 6:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:47PM on 24th February 2021
